he does not have the same level of vanity as Simon Cowell . Speaking to Parade, the CNN host claimed that Simon Cowell has undergone excessive facial treatments that he would never consider. He began: I'm not as vain as him, physically. He has all these treatments and Botox and all. I don't do that kind of thing. The former America's Got Talent judge added:`` I think we've both got big egos. Which are always, of course, driven half by supreme self-confidence and half by supreme insecurity.''

... It just[ felt] negative.'' The` Just Go With It' star was referring to past seasons that included the outspoken Simon Cowell at the judges' table. Oprah Winfrey defended him, saying, I'm a Simon Cowell fan and what I thought is that Simon Cowell had a way of speaking the truth that was saying what you wanted to say but you wouldn't actually say it. She added,`` I will say that it's a kinder, gentler[ show now.]''
